title: 53% American adults say they don't want to fly on a Boeing 737 Max (BA)
first_para: The Boeing 737 Max represents the latest generation of narrow-body passenger jets. It's also the latest version of the Boeing 737, the best-selling airliner in aviation history.

title: Boeing could get hit with a subpoena over its two deadly 737 Max 8 crashes (BA)
first_para: A powerful Democratic senator has said he's willing to use the House transportation committee's subpoena power on Boeing following a  second deadly crash involving its 737 Max 8 plane.

title: Europe has banned the Boeing 737 MAX — a plane that has crashed twice since October (BA)
first_para: The European Union Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) has banned all Boeing 737 MAX airliners from flying in Europe. The regulatory agency cited the need to ensure the safety of passengers following the crash of the Ethiopian Airlines Flight ET302 on Sunday. The incident, which killed all 157 on board, marked the second crash of a nearly brand new 737 MAX since October.

title: Boeing quietly unveiled the $442 million airliner that will replace the 747 jumbo jet (BA)
first_para: March 13 was supposed to be a media bonanza for Boeing. The aviation giant was set to unveil its next great wide-body jetliner — one that's destined to serve as its flagship for decades to come and finally replace the legendary 747 jumbo jet.

title: 10 things you need to know before the opening bell (SPY, SPX, QQQ, DIA, LYFT, BA)

title: Boeing's market value has plunged by $40 billion from its 2019 peak (BA)
first_para: Sunday's crash of a Boeing 737 Max 8 aircraft operated by Ethiopian Airlines continued to pressure Boeing's stock Tuesday, with shares trading down more than 5%. That follows a drop of 5.3% on Monday.

title: JPMorgan warns Boeing's 737 Max crisis could drag down the entire US economy (BA)
first_para: As  airlines begin to rethink their orders of Boeing's 737 Max plane, which is now grounded in most of the world after two deadly crashes, lost revenue for the company could draw down economists' measures of GDP growth — and even change how that economic growth is comprised — according to JPMorgan.

title: Millennials were scooping up Boeing's stock amid the 737 Max's turmoil (BA)
first_para: Boeing

title: One US airline will likely bear the brunt of the Boeing 737 Max ban (BA, LUV)
first_para: Southwest Airlines will face greater logistical challenges after the grounding of the Boeing 737 Max aircraft than United Airlines and American Airlines, the other US airlines  who use the aircraft, said Henry Harteveldt, the founder of the travel-research company Atmosphere Research Group.

title: Boeing's sliding stock is erasing more than 100 points from the Dow (BA)
first_para: Sunday's crash of a Boeing 737 Max 8 aircraft operated by Ethiopian Airlines continued to pressure Boeing's stock Tuesday morning, with shares trading down more than 7%. Boeing shares are under pressure for a second straight day after sliding 5.3% on Monday.

title: 10 things you need to know before the opening bell (SPY, SPX, QQQ, DIA, TSLA, BA, NKE, LEVI)
first_para: Indonesia's flagship airline moves to cancel its Boeing 737 Max orders. Garuda has asked Boeing to cancel a $5 billion order for 49 Boeing 737 Max 8 aircraft, saying its customers have "lost trust" in the plane.

title: Boeing is ramping up inspections after the US Air Force rejected its new KC-46 tanker planes again (BA)
first_para: The United States Air Force has once again rejected taking delivery of new Boeing KC-46 Pegasus tanker jets after discovering foreign object debris (FOD) left inside the aircraft by Boeing workers. This is the second time the USAF has stopped accepting deliveries of new KC-46s this year for the same exact reason, Reuters reported.

title: Boeing and Ethiopian investigators confirm a faulty sensor was triggered on the 737 Max shortly before it crashed (BA)
first_para: On Thursday, Ethiopia's Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau (AIB) released its preliminary report on the crash of Ethiopian Airlines Flight ET302, which killed all 157 passengers and crew. The crash, which took place on March 10, marked the second fatal crash of a nearly brand-new Boeing 737 Max airliner since October and precipitated the grounding of the global 737 Max fleet.

title: Here's why Boeing's stock didn't get whacked after Trump's emergency order to ground the 737 Max (BA)
first_para: Boeing's stock gained 0.46% Wednesday after President Donald Trump announced the grounding of all 737 Max aircrafts. The emergency order was announced after widespread calls by politicians on both sides of the aisle to cease flights of the aircraft until further investigation.

title: A major flight attendant’s union is calling on US regulators to investigate the plane involved in two crashes in five months (BA)
first_para: A labor union that represents nearly 50,000 flight attendants is sounding the alarm about the Boeing 737 Max 8, the plane model that has now been involved in  two deadly crashes in five months.

title: A timeline of Ethiopian Airlines Flight ET302 shows its pilots fighting desperately to save their doomed Boeing 737 Max jet (BA)
first_para: On Thursday, Ethiopia's Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau (AIB) released its preliminary report on the crash of Ethiopian Airlines Flight ET302. The crash, which took place on March 10, marked the second fatal crash of a nearly brand-new Boeing 737 Max airliner since October and precipitated the grounding of the global 737 Max fleet.

title: Boeing’s software update to the 737 Max 8 was reportedly delayed more than a month because of the government shutdown (BA)
first_para: After one of its 737 Max 8 planes crashed in October, Boeing was  working on a software update for a safety feature designed to pitch the plane's nose down to avoid a stall.

title: This is one of the black boxes that could unlock the cause of the Ethiopian Airlines Boeing 737 Max crash (BA)
first_para: Crash investigators released the first picture of the black boxes from Ethiopian Airlines Flight ET302. The photo, of the Boeing 737 Max 8 airliner's mangled flight data recorder, was published by the French government on Thursday.

title: 'You basically put a student pilot in there': The co-pilot of crashed Ethiopian Airlines Flight 302 had just 200 hours of flight experience (BA)
first_para: And having just 200 hours of experience is especially cumbersome when flying a massive jet like the Boeing 737 Max 8, which was the plane involved in the March 10 crash, said Ross Aimer, the CEO of the airline consulting and legal firm Aero Consulting Experts.

title: The government's grounding of all Boeing 737 Max jets is a reminder that the US still doesn't have a leader for its top air safety agency (BA)
first_para: On Tuesday, the US found itself alone in allowing the Boeing 737 Max 8, a plane now involved in two deadly crashes in five months, to continue to fly in its airspace. It was Trump who made the declaration that the  US would also ground the plane.

title: British Airways accidentally sent a plane to Scotland instead of Germany — and it turns out flights getting lost is more common than you think
first_para: Passengers on a British Airways flight on Monday from London to Düsseldorf, Germany, were shocked when an announcement welcomed them instead to Edinburgh, the capital of Scotland.

title: Being CEO is an incredibly lonely job, but here are the 3 things that have saved me again and again
first_para: I wanted a dog for a long time, but my wife, Sara, was a bit resistant. I don't blame her. We had three children in a period of 45 months, we both worked in demanding jobs, and we had just started to adjust to a new phase of life: parents of adolescents.

title: The US government says it has no reason to ground the Boeing 737 MAX that has crashed twice since October (BA)

title: A little-known quirk on the Boeing 737 may have made things difficult for the pilots of the crashed Ethiopian Airlines flight (BA)
first_para: Ethiopia's Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau (AIB) released its preliminary report on the crash of Ethiopian Airlines Flight ET302 on Thursday. One of the most confounding details to emerge from the 33-page document was the finding that the pilots successfully turned Boeing's troublesome MCAS (Maneuvering Characteristics Augmentation System) off only to switch it back on after the manual trim controls for the horizontal stabilizers didn't work.

title: The Boeing 737 MAX flies with American, United, and Southwest. Here's how to find out if you're flying on one. (BA, AAL, UAL, LUV)
first_para: It's the second nearly brand new Boeing 737 MAX airliner in recently be involved in a fatal crash. In October, Lion Air Flight JT610 crashed in the Java Sea shortly after taking off from Jakarta, Indonesia, killing all 189 people on board.

title: Boeing's big sell-off is causing the Dow to lag the S&P 500 (BA)
first_para: The sharp sell-off in shares of Boeing has caused the Dow Jones Industrial Average to lag behind the S&P 500 since the March 8 crash of an Ethiopian Airlines flight that was using the airplane manufacturer's 737 Max aircraft.

title: Boeing’s CEO wrote an open letter about the 737 Max plane groundings — here’s what he says the company is doing after two deadly crashes (BA)
first_para: Amid growing scrutiny surrounding the second crash of Boeing's 737 Max 8 plane in less than five months, the company's CEO on Monday released an open letter to airlines and passengers about the investigation.

title: Boeing's stock jumps after report says the plane maker will roll out a software upgrade for the 737 Max in 10 days (BA)
first_para: Boeing will be rolling out a software upgrade to the 737 Max aircraft in 10 days, according to an AFP report, citing one source. The corrective action is ahead of expectations for any fix, sending shares higher by 2% after having trading in negative territory earlier on Friday.

title: American Airlines is the second airline to warn investors that Boeing's 737 Max crisis will hurt its financial performance (AAL, BA)
first_para: American Airlines on Tuesday trimmed its first-quarter revenue forecast after cancelling hundreds of flights during the period, mainly due to the global grounding of Boeing's 737 Max.

title: The sensor believed to be at the heart of the Lion Air Boeing 737 Max disaster was reportedly repaired at a workshop in Florida before the crash (BA)
first_para: The first of two Boeing 737 Max planes to crash since October has been linked to a Florida maintenance shop, according to  investigation documents obtained by Bloomberg.

title: Everything we know about Ethiopian Airlines’ deadly crash of a Boeing 737 Max 8, the second disaster involving the plane in 5 months (BA)
first_para: Ethiopian Airlines' deadly crash on March 10 was the second disaster involving a Boeing 737 Max 8 aircraft in the last five months.

title: The crashed Lion Air and Ethiopian jets lacked safety features that could have helped because Boeing charged extra for them, report says (BA)
first_para: The Lion Air and Ethiopian Airlines jets that crashed over the past five months lacked two safety features related to the suspected cause of the crashes, because Boeing charged extra for them,  The New York Times reported Thursday.

title: China signs $34 billion order for 300 Airbus planes as country suspends licenses for Boeing 737 Max aircraft after deadly crashes (BA, AIRBUS)
first_para: China signed a multibillion-dollar deal with Airbus on Monday, one day before its aviation authority said it had suspended airworthiness certificates for Boeing's 737 Max 8, the model involved in two deadly crashes in the past five months.

title: Boeing is going to update the 737 MAX control software that's designed to fix a problem with the way the planes flies (BA)
first_para: The Boeing 737 Max will be receiving updated flight-control software, the airplane maker announced Tuesday. The announcement comes nearly five months after the crash of Lion Air Flight 610 and two days after the crash of Ethiopian Airlines Flight 302. Both involved effectively brand-new Boeing 737 Max 8 airliners.

title: Boeing's stock jumps after report says the plane maker will roll out a software upgrade for the 737 Max in 10 days (BA)
first_para: Boeing will be rolling out a software upgrade to the 737 Max aircraft in 10 days, according to an AFP report, citing one source. The corrective action is ahead of expectations for any fix, sending shares higher by 2% after having trading in negative territory earlier on Friday.

title: Boeing investigation reportedly finds new, 'relatively minor' software problem with 737 Max (BA)
first_para: The Federal Aviation Administration has ordered Boeing to fix a newly discovered software issue in its 737 Max aircraft before allowing it to fly, according to a Washington Post  report published on Thursday.

title: Boeing says it encouraged the FAA to temporarily ban its 737 Max planes (BA)
first_para: Boeing recommended that the Federal Aviation Administration temporarily ban its 737 Max aircraft "out of an abundance of caution," though the aerospace manufacturer says it is still confident in the aircraft's safety.

title: Boeing will start including a safety feature that customers previously had to pay for on all 737 Max aircraft (BA)
first_para: Boeing will start including a safety feature customers previously had to pay for on all of its 737 Max aircraft,  The New York Times reports.

title: The DOJ has reportedly subpoenaed Boeing as part of a criminal investigation involving the 737 Max (BA)
first_para: The US Department of Justice (DOJ) has subpoenaed Boeing as part of a criminal investigation into the certification and marketing processes for the aerospace manufacturer's 737 Max aircraft,  CNN reported.

title: These airlines will likely take the biggest hit after the Boeing 737 Max was involved in two deadly crashes (BA)

title: The worst outcome for Boeing after two deadly crashes involving its 737 Max 8 aircraft could lead airlines to lose trust in the company, an expert says (BA)
first_para: After  two deadly crashes in five months involving its 737 Max 8 aircraft, Boeing finds itself in a precarious position.
